C

Card - Class in ginRummy
Card represents a playing card in a deck of cards
Card() - Constructor for class ginRummy.Card
Default constructor sets suit and value as zero
Card(int, int) - Constructor for class ginRummy.Card
Advanced constructor, takes values for suit and value
cards - Variable in class ginRummy.Hand
An array of Cards to hold the Hand when it is converted into an array for sorting
checked - Variable in class ginRummy.Hand
An array which keeps track of which card values have been checked for potential books
compareTo(Object) - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Compares two cards, required for array sort.
ConsecutiveTo(Card) - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Tests whether a given card is the same suit and has a value consecutive to the given card
Cut() - Method in class ginRummy.Deck
Splits the deck at a random position and inverts the two halves.

D

Deal(Deck) - Method in class ginRummy.Game
Prompts the user for a number of players and then adds 7 Cards to each player's Hand.
Deck - Class in ginRummy
Deck represents a standard deck of playing cards with all the cards you'd expect except jokers Deck is a special type of Pile which can be cut and shuffled
Deck() - Constructor for class ginRummy.Deck
Constructor creates a Pile and adds four suits of 13 cards
deck - Variable in class ginRummy.Game
A deck of playing cards for this game
discard_pile - Variable in class ginRummy.Game
A Pile for Cards players discard from their Hands

G

Game - Class in ginRummy
Game is the main class to simulate a Gin Rummy card game of up to 4 players.
Game() - Constructor for class ginRummy.Game
Constructor creates a new Deck, shuffles it and deals the Cards out to a given number of player's Hands, creates a discard Pile, removes the top card from Deck and places it on the discard pile.
GetName() - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Returns the name of this card
GetSuit() - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Returns the suit number of this card
GetValue() - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Returns the value of this card
ginRummy - package ginRummy
 

H

Hand - Class in ginRummy
Hand represents a hand of Cards in a card game Hand is a special type of Pile which can be tested as a winning hand in Gin Rummy
Hand() - Constructor for class ginRummy.Hand
The constructor simply inherits from its superclass, Pile
hands - Variable in class ginRummy.Game
An array of all the Hands in the game.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ginRummy.Game
Creates a new game of Gin Rummy and plays the game
MakesRunWith(Card) - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Tests whether a given card could be used in combination with this card to create a "run" in Gin Rummy (i.e.

N

name - Variable in class ginRummy.Card
Verbose name for this card
Name() - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Assigns this card a verbose name based on its suit and value
number_of_players - Variable in class ginRummy.Game
The number of players playing this game.

P

Pile - Class in ginRummy
Pile is a class for representing a pile of Card objects.
Pile() - Constructor for class ginRummy.Pile
 
Play() - Method in class ginRummy.Game
Plays the game of Gin Rummy.
PrintDeck() - Method in class ginRummy.Deck
Prints the whole deck to the screen for testing purposes
PrintHand() - Method in class ginRummy.Hand
Prints the names of all the Cards in this hand in an ordered list

S

SameSuitAs(Card) - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Tests whether a given card is the same suit as this card
SameValueAs(Card) - Method in class ginRummy.Card
Tests whether a given card has the same value as this card
Shuffle() - Method in class ginRummy.Deck
Randomly re-arranges the Cards in the deck
suit - Variable in class ginRummy.Card
Suit number of this card

V

value - Variable in class ginRummy.Card
Value of this card

W

WinningHand() - Method in class ginRummy.Hand
Tests this Hand to determine whether it could be a winning hand in Gin Rummy.
